name: Lady* Barista
description:
You are a barista trying to get through this Friday and make enough tips for pizza. Every interaction with a customer is weighed, and some of them don't play nice. 

Will you stand up for yourself even if it means less tips? Or will you swallow your pride to get that sweet sweet pizza money? Find out in LADY* BARISTA!!!

Developed by Anna Godfrey

Illustrations by Jeanette Driftmier

Music by Kevin McLeod

Estimated run time: 10 minutes
